com.gams.platforms

Interface PlatformInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasePlatform, DebuggerPlatform

    public interface PlatformInterface
    Interface for defining a platform to be used by GAMS. Care must be taken to make all methods non-blocking, to prevent locking up the underlying MADARA context.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int analyze()
      Analyzes the platform.
      double getAccuracy()
      Returns the accuracy in meters
      java.lang.String getId()
      Gets the unique id of the platform.
      double getMinSensorRange()

      double getMoveSpeed()
      Gets the movement speed
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of the platform
      Position getPosition()
      Returns the current position
      double getPositionAccuracy()
      Returns the position accuracy in meters
      int home()
      Returns to the home location.
      int land()
      Requests the platform to land.

      Initializes a move to the target position.
      int rotate(Axes axes)
      Initializes a rotate along x, y, z axes.
      int sense()
      Gets results from the platform's sensors.
      void setMoveSpeed(double speed)
      Sets move speed
      void stopMove()
      Stops moving
      int takeoff()
      Takes off.

    • Method Detail

      • analyze

        int analyze()
        Analyzes the platform. This should be a non-blocking call.
        Returns:
        status information (@see PlatformStatusEnum)

      • getAccuracy

        double getAccuracy()
        Returns the accuracy in meters
        Returns:
        the accuracy of the platform

      • getPositionAccuracy

        double getPositionAccuracy()
        Returns the position accuracy in meters
        Returns:
        position accuracy

      • getPosition

        Position getPosition()
        Returns the current position
        Returns:
        the current position of the device/agent

      • home

        int home()
        Returns to the home location. This should be a non-blocking call.
        Returns:
        status information (@see PlatformReturnStatusEnum)

      • land

        int land()
        Requests the platform to land. This should be a non-blocking call.
        Returns:
        status information (@see PlatformReturnStatusEnum)

      • move

        int move(Position target,
         double proximity)
        Initializes a move to the target position. This should be a non-blocking call.
        Parameters:
        target - the new position to move to
        proximity - the minimum distance between current position and target position that terminates the move.
        Returns:
        status information (@see PlatformReturnStatusEnum)

      • rotate

        int rotate(Axes axes)
        Initializes a rotate along x, y, z axes. This should be a non-blocking call and implements an extrinsic rotation.
        Parameters:
        axes - parameters for rotation along x, y, z axes
        Returns:
        status information (@see PlatformReturnStatusEnum)

      • getMinSensorRange

        double getMinSensorRange()
        Get sensor radius
        Returns:
        minimum radius of all available sensors for this platform

      • getMoveSpeed

        double getMoveSpeed()
        Gets the movement speed
        Returns:
        movement speed

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Gets the unique id of the platform. This should be an alphanumeric id that can be part of a MADARA variable name. Specifically, this is used in the variable expansion of .platform.{yourid}.*
        Returns:
        the id of the platform (alphanumeric only: no spaces!)

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of the platform
        Returns:
        the name of the platform

      • sense

        int sense()
        Gets results from the platform's sensors. This should be a non-blocking call.
        Returns:
        the status of the platform, @see PlatformStatusEnum

      • setMoveSpeed

        void setMoveSpeed(double speed)
        Sets move speed
        Parameters:
        speed - new speed in meters/second

      • takeoff

        int takeoff()
        Takes off. This should be a non-blocking call.
        Returns:
        status information (@see PlatformReturnStatusEnum)

      • stopMove

        void stopMove()
        Stops moving
